🍓 Wild Strawberry Strain – Autoflowering F1 Hybrid Seeds by Tastebudz Syndicate

Bright, Fruity, and Fast – Meet the Wild Strawberry Strain

The wild strawberry strain by Tastebudz Syndicate is a sativa-dominant autoflower bred for flavour, focus, and speed. Created by crossing Strawberry Amnesia with Forbidden Fruitz Auto, this fruity powerhouse packs 25% THC and a clean, uplifting high that’s perfect for daytime use.

As part of our premium F1 autoflower range, Wild Strawberry delivers consistent performance, vigorous growth, and terpene-rich buds with minimal effort. Whether you’re looking to add clarity to your day or a smile to your face, this hybrid auto delivers with ease.

Want a taste of next-gen autoflowers? The Wild Strawberry F1 Auto is powered by autoflowering seeds bred for speed and strength.
These seeds are sold as adult souvenirs. Germination is prohibited in the UK without a licence.

📊 Wild Strawberry Strain Specs

Feature Details
Genetics Strawberry Amnesia x Forbidden Fruitz Auto
Strain Type Sativa-Dominant Autoflowering Hybrid
Flowering Time 8–10 Weeks
Indoor Yield 450–500g/m²
THC Content Up to 25%
Flavours Strawberry, citrus, candy-sweet
Aromas Fruity, zesty, tropical
Effects Uplifted, focused, creative, lightly relaxed

🌟 Why Collectors Love the Wild Strawberry Strain

  • F1 Autoflower Performance – Superior hybrid vigour, fast finishes, and more uniform plants
  • Bold Strawberry Flavour – Sweet fruit notes with zesty citrus and tropical undertones
  • Smooth Daytime High – A clear-headed, feel-good buzz with a gentle body effect
  • High Yield, Low Effort – 8–10 week lifecycle with strong growth indoors or out
  • Creative Energy + Chill Vibes – Perfect for daytime focus, light socialising, or low-key relaxation

❓ Frequently Asked Questions About Wild Strawberry Strain

1. What is the Wild Strawberry strain?
It’s a flavour-forward sativa-dominant hybrid created from Strawberry Amnesia and Forbidden Fruitz Auto. Known for its fruity profile and energising effects, it’s part of the Tastebudz F1 auto range.

2. What makes F1 autoflower seeds better?
F1 autos offer superior consistency, stronger resistance to stress, and faster flowering than standard autoflowers. That means better yields, more uniform plants, and fewer surprises.

3. Is Wild Strawberry strain good for daytime use?
Absolutely! It’s ideal for clear-headed focus, light creativity, and mood-lifting energy — without knocking you out.

4. What does the wild strawberry strain taste like?
Expect juicy red berries, a citrus twist, and smooth candy-like sweetness that lingers after the exhale.

5. How long does Wild Strawberry take from seed to harvest?
You can expect it to finish in just 8–10 weeks, making it a quick and rewarding option for collectors of all experience levels.

🛒 Add Wild Strawberry to Your Collection Today

If you’re after flavour, focus, and fast results, the wild strawberry strain is a must-have. With its delicious taste, feel-good effects, and F1 auto reliability, it’s ideal for flavour chasers and fans of top-shelf autoflowers alike.
